author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Fix the `HLTrigger/Configuration/test/hltHarvesting.py` test file, setting the missing `dqmSaver.workflow` to `"/DQM/HLT/Online"`.

#### PR validation:

`hltHarvesting.py` now runs.

#### Backport

Backport of #38132
title: Set a missing parameter in the `dqmSaver` in the `hltHarvesting` test [12.4.x]
